import React from 'react' import Header from '../header/header'; import Carousel from './Carousel' import Dots from './Indicatore' import Buttons from './CarouselButton' import Slider from './Slider' import './Carousel.css' import Slider1 from '../../images/carousel/slide1.png' import Slider2 from '../../images/carousel/slide2.png' import Slider3 from '../../images/carousel/slide3.png' // Main App class Index extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { header: [ { title: 'Carousel Sliders' } ], axis: 'x', width: this.props.width, height: this.props.height, className: this.props.className } this.setAxis = axis => { return () => this.setState({'axis': axis}) } } render () { let data = [ "Apple", "Ball", "Cat", "Dog", "Elephant", "Fruits", "Gorilla", "Horse", "Ink", "Jug", "Kite", "Lemon", "Orange", "Paddy", "Queen", "Rose", "Street", "Tuesday", "Umbrella", "Vanilla", "Wax", "Xerox", "Yarn", "Zebra" ]; return (

You can create carousel slider using images, videos, posts or product previews. Sliders have custom height and width.

) } } export default Index;
